plugins.name: multi-cli-harness
plugins.description: Multi-provider AI CLI harness with intelligent routing, automatic fallback, and multi-backend configuration sync. Features Matrix-themed agent teams (17 agents), Claude Code Teams integration, mental model document support, and interview-based setup. Routes tasks through Claude Code -> OpenCode/Anthropic -> OpenCode/Gemini -> Gemini CLI with quota monitoring.
